summary: A configuration utility that encapsulates the set of parameters supported by Fireworks AI embedding models, offers a check to determine whether a given model belongs to the Fireworks embedding family, and translates OpenAI‑style parameter names into the equivalents expected by Fireworks.
business_intent: Facilitate seamless integration of Fireworks AI embedding services by providing consistent parameter handling and model identification, reducing friction when adapting OpenAI‑oriented code to Fireworks.
